Text: RE SAN JUAN BASIN rd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORTLippman Consulting Inc has just completed the rd quarter of San Juan Basin production report This report contains historical gas volumes that are separated out by conventional and coal seam properties The report also separates the production by each contributing state Volumes are reported annually as well as quarterly for the past years The report contains charts and graphs depicting various historical statistics including the gas production volumes number of new wells drilled each year and monthly rig activity The data clearly shows that the San Juan Basin production has peaked and is now on a decline The cost for this report is on a quarterly subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a onetime basis for If you would like additional information on this report or on any of our other reports please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

ROCKY MOUNTAIN nd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORTRE ROCKY MOUNTAIN nd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORT Lippman Consulting Inc has just completed the Rocky Mountain nd Quarter of Production Report This report contains historical volumes for each of the producing basins contained in the Rocky Mountain Region This report contains over pages of text and graphs depicting various statistics Drilling programs by operator number of wells first delivered in each basin rig activities as well as monthly gas production volumes are fully illustrated Production volumes are reported both annually and quarterly The cost for the report is per quarter when order on an annual subscription or you can order on a one time basis for If you would like additional information or to order this report or any other report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

RE NEW GREAT LAKES PIPELINE REPORTLippman Consulting Inc is proud to announce that it has started publishing a monthly Great Lakes Pipeline Report This report will provide our clients with up to date information on the Bcfd capacity system that is a vital link to Canadian supplies The report will detail the supply movements east from Emerson through the Great Lakes system till it reaches delivery back into Canada at St Clair The cost for the report is per month on an annual subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a quarterly basis for If you would like additional information on this report or on any of our other products please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

RE MIDCONTINENT nd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORTLippman Consulting Inc has just completed the MidContinent Quarterly Production Report for the second quarter of MidContinent region is second only to the Gulf Coast Region in providing natural gas supplies for this country The region includes the following basins the Anadarko Basin the Arkoma Basin and the Fort Worth Basin with the extensive HugotonPanhandle area The MidContinent region included in this region are the states of Arkansas Kansas Oklahoma and Districts B and in the state of Texas The report contains drilling programs by operator the number of wells first delivered in each area rig activities as well as gas production volumes Historical production volumes are reported both annually and quarterly and displayed both tabular and graphically The cost for this report is on a quarterly subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a one time basis for If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

RE GULF COAST rd QUARTERLY PRODUCTION REPORTRE GULF COAST rd QUARTERLY PRODUCTION REPORT Lippman Consulting Inc is pleased to announce that it has just completed the rd quarterly of production report for the Gulf Coast Region This report contains numerous charts and graphs as well as extensive text depicting the historical volumes produced from this region through the third quarter of This report analyzes the production in various ways so that the reader can obtain a complete understanding of the supplies contained in this dynamic region This is truly a bottoms up report Lippman Consulting is currently publishing twelve separate monthly reports covering each of the areas specific regions that make up the Gulf Coast Extensive detailed data is contained in each of those reports This quarterly report which compiles the data for each of those area reports is intended to be a summary report for our clients that do not want that level of detail but want to be advised on the overall Gulf volumes The Gulf Coast region contains almost of the domestic production and therefore is very important to the overall national gas markets The cost for this report is on a quarterly subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a onetime basis for If you would like additional information or to order this report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

CALIFORNIA nd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORTLippman Consulting Inc is pleased to announce that it has just completed the nd quarterly of gas production report for the state of California This report contains text and graphs depicting various historical statistics The total California production volumes are separated by associated and nonassociated volumes The report also separates production by state and federal areas as well as onshore and offshore volumes For the onshore volumes we detail the production down to the district level while for the offshore volumes we detail those down to the field level In addition to showing historical production volumes in various categories the report also provides the reader with monthly net gas storage injection and withdrawal volumes along with the total gas volumes in storage for the state Working gas as well as cushion gas levels are also reported California is a major consuming district and the level of production contained within the state has a direct bearing on the amount of gas imports that will be needed to satisfy demand The cost for this report is on a quarterly subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a one time basis for If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

NEW TRANSCANADA PIPELINE REPORTLippman Consulting Inc is proud to announce that it has started publishing a monthly TransCanada Pipeline report This report will provide our clients with up to date information on the Bcfd that is transported on TransCanada system The report details all supply movement west from Empress Attached for your review is a copy of the report that will show the detailed data that is provided The cost for the report is per month on an annual subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a quarterly basis for If you would like additional information on this report or on any of our other products please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

NORTH AMERICAN REGIONAL FLOWSRE NORTH AMERICAN REGIONAL FLOWS Lippman Consulting Inc is pleased to announce that it has expanded the Western North American Supply Movement report and renamed it the North American Regional Flows We have divided North American into regional areas including Canada and Mexico This monthly report will capture the volumes flowing from region to region At this time we have complete data on the flows for regions through and incomplete data for flows from regions through As we expand our pipeline coverage we will continually update this report with our expanded coverage Attached for your review is the update map showing flow for the month of December The full report also contains a data base with three years of historical flow for each of the points shown on the map The cost for this report is per month on an annual subscription or the report can be purchased on a onetime basis for If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

MIDCONTINENT rd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORTRE MIDCONTINENT rd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORT Lippman Consulting Inc has just completed the MidContinent Quarterly Production Report for the third quarter of MidContinent region is second only to the Gulf Coast Region in providing natural gas supplies for this country The region includes the following basins the Anadarko Basin the Arkoma Basin and the Fort Worth Basin with the extensive HugotonPanhandle area The MidContinent region included in this region are the states of Arkansas Kansas Oklahoma and Districts B and in the state of Texas The report contains drilling programs by operator rig activities as well as gas production volumes Historical production volumes are reported both annually and quarterly and displayed both tabular and graphically The cost for this report is on a quarterly subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a one time basis for If you would like additional information on this report or any other report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc East Sunset Suite E El Paso Texas Phone Fax

ANNUAL NORTH AMERICAN SUPPLY MOVEMENTRE ANNUAL NORTH AMERICAN SUPPLY MOVEMENT Lippman Consulting Inc is pleased to announce that it has completed the Annual North American Supply Movement report This reports shows schematically the annual average supply movements between regions for and The report also shows schematically the net change in volumes transported between the regions during the past two years LCI has divided North American into regional separate regions including Canada and Mexico At this time we have complete data on over half of the regions The cost for this report is If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

NEW REMAINING RESERVE REPORTNEW REMAINING RESERVE REPORT Lippman Consulting Inc is proud to announce that is has just completed a new Lower States Dry Remaining Reserve Report This report lists annually the reserves additions revisions and production as well as the reserve life index for the period through The data for this report was obtained from the EIA and is shown in both a table and graphical form LCI has captured the data and summarized the report into the separate producing regions that we have used for all our other production reports Individual charts and tables are provided for each of the separate regions The report quickly gives the reader an excellent overview of the historical activities that have been underway in each of the regions It highlights the growth of some regions and the significant declines in other regions Historical reserve life index over the period for each region is provided to inform the reader of the producing ability of that region The cost for the report is If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc East Sunset Suite E El Paso Texas Phone Fax

RE TWO NEW PIPELINE REPORTSRE TWO NEW PIPELINE REPORTS Lippman Consulting Inc is proud to announce that it has expanded its monthly pipeline reports by adding two new pipelines The two new systems are the Williston Basin Interstate Pipeline Company and the CMS Trunkline Gas Company Both of these two new reports will contain the same detailed information on the major receipts and deliveries along these pipelines as our clients have grown to expect With these two reports we have completed our coverage of the Rocky Mountain region and expanding our coverage of the Gulf Coast region Over the next few months our clients will see continuing expansion of our pipeline reporting coverage in the Gulf Coast region The cost for either one of these reports is per month on an annual subscription or the reports can be purchased on a onetime basis for As a reminder our Retainer Clients will receive these new reports at no additional charge If you would like additional information on our Retainer Client services or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

RE PERMIAN BASIN rd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORTRE PERMIAN BASIN rd QUARTER PRODUCTION REPORT Lippman Consulting Inc has just completed the Permian Basin Production report that contains historical volumes for the basin through the rd quarter of The report separates the Permian Basin into the following four regions Southeast New Mexico and the Texas districts of C and A The report contains text and graphs depicting various historical statistics for each of the four regions as well as for the total basin Statistics on the number of new wells first delivered rig activity and the operators that are most active in the region are included in the study The cost for the report is on a quarterly subscription basis or the report can be purchased on a one time basis for If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc East Sunset Suite E El Paso Texas Phone Fax

RE WESTERN CANADIAN SEDIMENTARY BASINLinda Please send the following email message to the people that I have marked on the attached list Please make them blind copies Lippman Consulting Inc is proud to announce that we will start publishing a quarterly production report for the Western Canadian Sedimentary Basins The data contained in this report will cover the period through the third quarter of This report will contain the same level of detail that our clients have experienced from our other quarterly production reports The report will analyze the historical wellhead production well completions and rig activity The data will be presented in both test and charts and graphs Historical data will be separate out by each of the threeproduction providences and will be reported on an annual basis a quarterly basis and in some cases on a monthly basis The cost for the report is on a quarterly subscription or the report can be purchased on a onetime basis for If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

NEW LOWER STATES GAS SUPPLY AND CONSUMPTION REPORTNEW LOWER STATES GAS SUPPLY AND CONSUMPTION REPORT Lippman Consulting Inc is proud to announce that it has started publishing a quarterly Lower States Gas Supply and Consumption report This report details the overall balance between supply and demand for the Lower States Canadian imports and Mexican exports as well as volumes from LNG are analyzed Total injection and withdrawal volumes from storage reservoirs are listed along with volumes from supplemental fuels Attached for your review is a copy of this new report that will show the detailed data that is provided The cost for the report is per quarter when order on an annual subscription or you can order on a one time basis for If you would like additional information on this report or on any of our other products please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc

LIPPMAN CONSULTING PIPELINE REPORTSLIPPMAN CONSULTING PIPELINE REPORTS Attached for your information is a map showing all the pipelines that Lippman Consulting Inc currently publishes monthly reports As the map shows we currently track all the pipes in the west and our intention is to expand our coverage east Over the next few months we will be adding several new pipelines to our coverage In addition as our pipeline coverage expands we will be able to expand our regional movement reports to new areas We will keep you updated with future announcements If you would like additional information or to order the report please feel free to contact me by email at OLcom or phone at George Lippman President Lippman Consulting Inc
